definition: prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough

sentences.english: To discuss the mechanism of scleral expansion in therapying the presbyopia.
sentences.chinese: 探討鞏膜擴張術治療老視的機理。

sentences.english: Objective To compare the effect of three methods for scientific fitting presbyopia in primary hospital.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討基層眼科老視的科學驗配方法。

sentences.english: With advancing age, my grandpa gets more and more serious presbyopia.
sentences.chinese: 增加，爺爺的老視越來越嚴重了。

sentences.english: A multifocal lens designed for the correction of presbyopia.
sentences.chinese: 一款多焦點鏡片帶有矯正老視的設計。

sentences.english: An estimated 90 million people in the United States presently have presbyopia.
sentences.chinese: 估計目前有9千萬美國人患有老視。
